title: Single Car Attached Garage Options Available For 3x2
map_address: 19600 Clubhouse Dr near S Parker Rd
posting_body: This is a 3 Bedroom, 2 Bath, approximately 1278 Sq.
We are eager for you to get better acquainted with the Parker Hilltop community.
When you walk around in our community, you will immediately be impressed with the stylish exterior architecture, relaxed ambiance, and deluxe amenities that are available to residents.
Schedule your private tour by contacting our team of leasing consultants today!

Private Patio/Balcony*, Vinyl Plank-Wood Flooring, Washer & Dryer in Home*, Beautiful 1-, 2-, and 3- Bedroom Apartment Homes, Gas Fireplaces with Granite Surround*, Large Master Bedrooms with Walk-In Closets, Attached and Detached Garages Available, Garden Style Soaking Tubs*, Beautiful Quartz or Granite Countertops Throughout, Vaulted Ceilings*

Smoke Free Community, Community Playground, Additional Storage Space Available, Covered Parking, Attaches Garages, & Detached Garages Available, Outdoor Grilling Lounge & Picnic Area, Door-to-Door Rubbish Pick-Up Service, 24-Hour Fitness Center with Cybex Equipment, Resident Clubhouse Open to 10pm Featuring a Community Kitchen, Business Center, Pool Access, Resident Lounge, and Multi-Media Lounge with 80"" Video Display, On-Site Management with 24-Hour Emergency Maintenance and On-Call Courtesy Patrol, Resort-Style Pool wit Water Features Including a Year-Round Infinity Edge Hot Tub and Indoor/Outdoor Terrace Seating, Pet-Friendly Community with On-Site Dog Park
We love your pets and are excited to welcome them to their new home!
We allow two pets per apartment home with a combined weight not exceed 160 lbs.
Cats and dogs are welcome at our community although some breed restrictions apply.
